typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source2, source1 exists(source2@ID == source1@ID,
	negate:true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
